The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the do not realize that they are going to be feeding the bodies of their lost members and capturing the women for themselves. It's a straight forward creature based horror film and whether or not this one finds a following is hard to say. The acting is okay and the biggest names are Abhor Love with love the same name
